headline: Strong Earnings and Raised Outlook Might Change the Case for Investing in Gen Digital (GEN)
summary: In the past week, Gen Digital raised its full-year revenue and earnings outlook following strong fiscal first-quarter results, highlighted by 30% revenue growth and a 20% increase in net income year over year. This upward revision reflects momentum in the company’s cybersecurity and AI-driven offerings, attracting fresh institutional investment and heightened attention to its trust-based solutions business. With Gen Digital citing expanding demand for AI-powered cyber safety products, we'll...
